paragraphs.title: Best Way to Contact Me
paragraphs.p: The best way to contact me is by using the D2L Brightspace e-mail system which can be accessed from the Classlist. You can use it to send an e-mail to me and/or your classmates.

You should include a relevant subject in the Subject: header of your e-mail. The subject should include the class you are taking (including the course number and CRN) and the topic of your message. For example, you email subject line might be: [MTH 95 - CRN 42651]: Help with Section 10.1 Homework If you treat your email subject line this way, it helps me prioritize getting back to you quickly. I sometimes get a hundred or more emails in just one day, and I want your emails (my student's emails) to be the ones I prioritize.

If your question or comment would be of interest to other students, please consider posting it to the General Discussions area instead. Then I can publicly answer your question, and the entire class will benefit from the answers.
You can also find me in Office Hours as described in .

paragraphs.title: Responses from Me
paragraphs.p: You can expect me to reply to your emails and discussion posts within 48 hours, and often much sooner. I often will not reply to messages sent in the evening until the following day. This is only because I am not always online in the evenings. This means that if you wait until the evening an assignment is due to reach out to me for help, then I might not get to replying until after the assignment is due.

paragraphs.title: Discord
paragraphs.p: This course has an associated Discord server, and I recommend that you join. If you have never used Discord before, I think that you will find it very helpful for this course. You should receive an invitation from me over email. That invitation eventually expires, so if you waited too long, just send me a message so I can send you a new inivitation.
Discord will be great for you communicating with each other within your study groups. But you can also use it to communicate with the entire class or with me.
